typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{MeterPoint Code} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{Plant Code} as string,
		{Date/Time} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Data Value} as double '000,000,000.00',
		Units as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['LP*.csv']) ~> LPSource
LPSource aggregate(groupBy({Date/Time},
		{MeterPoint Code},
		{Data Type}),
	MedianValue = round(mean({Data Value}))
,
		MaximumValue = round(max({Data Value})),
		MinimumValue = round(min({Data Value}))) ~> LPAggregate
LPAggregate sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		Date as date,
		MeterCode as string,
		DataType as string,
		AverageValue as double,
		MinimumValue as double,
		MaximumValue as double,
		MedianValue as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		MeterCode = {MeterPoint Code},
		Date = {Date/Time},
		DataType = {Data Type},
		MinimumValue,
		MaximumValue,
		MedianValue
	)) ~> LPSink
